numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some students have a legacy status.
2. Some students do not have a legacy status.
3. Students who have a legacy status have a higher percentage of getting into elite colleges than students who do not have a legacy status.
4. I wonder whether the data will be mostly equal in the future.
6. This situation relates to my community.
7. A college has an acceptance rate.
8. A college's acceptance rate gives some information about the college.
9. This information includes the resources of the college.
10. This information includes the community of the college.
11. This information includes the experiences that students can expect to encounter.
13. While students decide on their colleges, students can use this information.
14. The name of the graph is: Injustice is seen in "Elite" Colleges acceptances.
